SEARCH
Package it.polimi.it.model

Class User

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.it.model.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class User extends Object implements Serializable
User class: For each player, one instance of the User class is created; it contains instances of chat and shelfie.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String nickname)
      Method that creates a new instance of User given
      Parameters:
      nickname - chosen by the player. The method also sets the new shelf and chat for the user

  • Method Details

    • maxValueOfTiles

      public int maxValueOfTiles()
      Method that
      Returns:
      the maximum number of tiles that the user can take to put them in the shelfie

    • choosableTiles

      public List<List<Tile>> choosableTiles(int tilesNum) throws IllegalValueException, RemoteException
      Given
      Parameters:
      tilesNum - the number of tiles that the player wants to get from the board
      Returns:
      the list of lists that contain the tiles valid so that the player can take them from the board
      Throws:
      IllegalValueException - .
      RemoteException - .

    • chooseSelectedTiles

      public boolean[] chooseSelectedTiles(List<Tile> chosen) throws WrongTileException
      Method that, given a list of tiles that the player chose, checks the tiles and finds which columns may contain the selected tiles
      Parameters:
      chosen - is the list of the tiles that the player chose
      Returns:
      an array of booleans (one each column) True: this column can be chosen False: this column can't be chosen
      Throws:
      WrongTileException - .

    • insertTile

      public boolean insertTile(int column, List<Tile> chosen) throws RemoteException
      Method to insert a certain number of tiles in a given column of the user's shelfie
      Parameters:
      column - is the column where the tiles have to be put
      chosen - is a list of the tiles that have to be put in the given column
      Returns:
      the boolean that represents the failure or the success of the latest operation
      Throws:
      RemoteException - .
